channel.title: 16 year old girl given 6 month sentence for false rape allegation
channel.description:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-wales-south-east-wales-11941868
This shit makes me sick, three men's lives severely affected because of one stupid whore.
As we can all see with the charges against Julian Assange, the consequences of a false rape accusation to the accused can often be almost as bad as if they had actually raped someone.

item.title: 16 year old girl given 6 month sentence for false rape allegation
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

super_:

/r/mensrights

What rights?

Father wants to keep the baby? Woman tells him to take a hike and gets an abortion despite his wishes.
Father wants nothing to do with parenthood? Woman tells him to take a hike and keeps the baby despite his wishes.

The good news is that new birth control technologies are apparently coming about (a men’s birth control pill, taken orally and daily just like the woman’s), and these will empower men to put a stop to unwanted children.
There won’t have to be trust issues anymore once there is equality between the sexes in their ability to prevent birth; each party that doesn’t want a child takes the birth control, so only those truly wishing for children will have them.
Save for a few unlucky cases here and there.

Read full topic
